system_description: ScanlonSoft Retail Solution. A SaaS platform running in Azure that provides point of sale retail software to small businesses. React frontend, with APIs hosted in Azure App Service on the backend and an Azure SQL Database.
issue_summary: Critical database outage causing service downtime.

conversation_history.message: Our system is completely down, and none of our stores can process sales. Please help immediately!
We are investigating the issue now. It appears to be related to the database. We'll keep you updated.
This is highly urgent! Our business is losing money every minute this is down.
Understood. We've identified the problem as a misconfiguration in the database scaling settings. Applying a fix now.
How long will the fix take? We need this resolved ASAP.
The fix has been applied, and services are coming back online. Please verify if everything is working on your end.
It looks like everything is functioning again. Thank you for resolving this quickly.
You're welcome. Let us know if you experience any further issues.

resolution: Database scaling misconfiguration was identified and corrected, restoring service functionality.
root_cause: Incorrect database scaling settings caused resource exhaustion, leading to downtime.
